characterDescription: Liss is an assassin who is employed by Jasnah to spy on Queen Aesudan Kholin, former King Elhokar's wife. Liss is known as the Weeper because she gouges out the eyes of the targets she kills.

characterDetails.Appearance:
Liss wears a low-cut maid's dress, has long dark hair - worn loose - and has a plump, attractive figure.
Her attire could've been Alethi, or Veden, or Bav.
characterDetails.Speculation:
With regard to the gouged out eyes, there is a reference which holds significance.
Was Brandon aware of this as he developed the character of Liss or is this something that he intended to remain rather vague?
characterDetails.Notes: It is implied that Liss owns a Shardblade.
